mapper.sql: user_id, password, user_name, sex, department, phone, mail, position, major, identity, is_able_login, leader_id
user_name, sex, department, phone, mail, position, major
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from tbl_User
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_User
user_id,
password,
user_name,
sex,
department,
phone,
mail,
position,
major,
identity,
is_able_login,
leader_id,

mapper.update:
update tbl_User
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{record.department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{record.mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{record.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{record.major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity = #{record.identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_able_login = #{record.isAbleLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
leader_id = #{record.leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tbl_User set user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{record.department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{record.mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{record.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{record.major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity = #{record.identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_able_login = #{record.isAbleLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leader_id = #{record.leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_User
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_able_login = #{isAbleLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_User set password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_able_login = #{isAbleLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.project_category_id,project_category_name, project_application_id,project_name,project_description, a.user_id,user_name,department,project_progress_id, project_application_upload_address,concluding_report_end_time from tbl_User as a,tbl_ProjectApplication as b, tbl_ProjectProgress as c,tbl_ProjectCategory as d where c.project_progress_id = b.project_application_id and a.user_id = b.user_id and a.user_id = c.user_id and d.project_category_id = b.project_category_id and d.review_leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.project_process = 3

select count(*) from tbl_ProjectApplication as a,tbl_ProjectProgress as b where review_leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.project_application_id = b.project_progress_id and (review_phase = 5 or project_process = 4)

select count(*) from tbl_ProjectApplication as a,tbl_ProjectProgress as b where review_leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.project_application_id = b.project_progress_id and (review_phase = 6 or project_process = 5)
select count(*) from tbl_ProjectApplication where review_leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and review_phase = 4

select count(*) from tbl_ProjectCategory as a,tbl_ProjectProgress as b where a.review_leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.project_category_id = b.project_category_id and b.project_process = 4
